column2: "Dɛm na hom mma nyimpa mbu hɛn
column3: dɛ Kraest asomfo nye Nyankopɔn esumasɛm do ahwɛfo."

column2: "Na
column3: afei
column4: dza wɔhwehwɛ no ɔhwɛfo ho nye dɛ wohu no ɔnokwafo."

column2: "Na emi dze
column3: ɔyɛ me asɛm ketseaba bi dɛ hom anaa nyimpa abaguafo bobu me atsɛn: mankasa mpo mummbu moho atsɛn."

column2: "Na mankasa minnyim biribi tsia mo ho
column3: naaso minndzi bem wɔ iyi mu: nyia obu me atsɛn nye Ewuradze."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi mma hom nntwar ber ano mmbu biribi ho atsɛn
column3: ma onkodu dɛ Ewuradze bɛba
column4: ɔno na ɔdze sum mu dza osuma nyina bɛba kan mu
column5: na oeyi akoma mu apam edzi: nna obiara benya n'ayɛyi efi Nyankopɔn hɔ."

column2: "Nsɛm yi
column3: enuanom
column4: madan ama mankasa moho nye Apollos ma hom eesua wɔ hɛn ho dɛ mma hom nntra dza wɔakyerɛw no
column5: amma ɔbaako ntsi obi aannhoran enntsia ɔbaako."

column2: "Na woana na ɔma eyɛ dansewa fi afofor mu? Na ebɛnadze na ewɔ a wɔammfa amma wo? Na sɛ inyae a
column3: ɔyɛ dɛn na ehyehyɛ woho dɛ gyama ennya?"

column2: "Hom ewie mee dada; nyew
column3: hom enya hom ho dada; hom ekwetsir hɛn edzi hen: nkyɛ mepɛ dɛ hom dzi hen ampa
column4: ama hɛn so yɛnnye hom eedzi."

column2: "Na mususu dɛ Nyankopɔn dze hɛn asomafo edzi ekyir
column3: dɛ hɔn a woeyi hɔn ama owu; osiandɛ yɛayɛ ahwɛdze ama wiadze nye abɔfo nye nyimpa."

column2: "Yɛyɛ nkwasea wɔ Kraest ntsi
column3: na hom dze
column4: hom yɛ enyansafo wɔ Kraest mu; yɛyɛ mberɛw

column2: "Ɔdze bodu sesei dɔn yi mu ɔkɔm nye nsukɔm nyina dze hɛn
column3: yedzi adagyaw

column2: "na yɛberɛ dze hɛnara hɛn nsa yɛ edwuma; wɔyaw hɛn a
column3: yehyira; wɔhaw hɛn a

column2: "wɔsɛɛ hɛn dzin a
column3: yɛka abodweesɛm kyerɛ hɔn; yɛayɛ dɛ wiadze fi
column4: nyimpa mu ntɔmpamu dze ebodu ndɛ."

column2: "Nnyɛ dɛ merebɛhyɛ hom fɛr ntsi na merekyerɛw iyi
column3: na mbom dɛ murubotu hom fo dɛ mba a modɔ hɔn a."

column2: "Na sɛ hom wɔ akwankyerɛfo pedu wɔ Kraest mu mpo a
column3: hom nnyi egyanom pii: na emi na menam asɛmpa no do mowoo hom wɔ Kraest Jesus mu."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi meserɛ hom
column3: hom nsuasua me."

column2: "Iyi ntsi na masoma Timoti a ɔyɛ me ba dɔfo nye nokwafo wɔ Ewuradze mu no wɔ hom nkyɛn; ɔno na ɔbɛkaa hom m'akwan a ɔwɔ Kraest mu
column3: dɛ mbrɛ mekyerɛkyerɛ wɔ asɔrasɔr nyina mu

column2: "Na wosusu dɛ gyama meremmba hom nkyɛn ntsi na binom rohoran no."
"Na sɛ Ewuradze pɛ a
column3: mebɛba hom nkyɛn ntsɛmara
column4: na mubohu hɔn a wɔahoran no hɔn tum

column2: "Osiandɛ Nyankopɔn ahendzi nnyi kasa mu ara gyan
column3: na mbom tum mu."

column2: "Dza ɔwɔ hen na hom pɛ? Memfa abaa mbra hom do
column3: anaa memfa ɔdɔ nye ɔdwe sunsum?"
